hadiths.text: Narrated 'Aishah: "The only bed that the Messenger of Allah had which he slept was [made of a tanned skin] stuffed with palm-fibres." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. He Said: There are narrations on thus topic from Hafsah and Jabir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فِرَاشِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Bed Of The Prophet (ﷺ)
